A LLC is amended by filing Articles of Amendment with the Secretary of State. LegalZoom can prepare and file your required Amendment paperwork with the appropriate state agency.
For your convenience, I have provided a summary of our Amendment fees:
Standard Amendment Package {!snippetVariable.stdamd_pricing} (20-35 Business Days) Rush Amendment Package {!snippetVariable.rushamd_pricing} (7-10 Business Days)
To place your Amendment order, simply reply to this email or contact me by phone at $biz_phone $biz_hours. Please provide the following information:
1. Your name, phone number, email address, and mailing address 2. LLC name and state of formation 3. Business address 4. New name Previous LegalZoom order number (if applicable) 5. Credit card number and expiration date
Best regards,
